$comment: OSCAL System Security Plan (SSP) Format: JSON Schema

metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

back-matter.title: Back matter
back-matter.description: A collection of citations and resource references.

revision.title: Revision History Entry
revision.description: An entry in a sequential list of revisions to the containing document in reverse chronological order (i.e., most recent previous revision first).

link.title: Link
link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

rel.title: Relation
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

published.title: Publication Timestamp
published.description: The date and time this document was published.

last-modified.title: Last modified timestamp
last-modified.description: Date and time of last modification.

version.title: Document version
version.description: The version of the document content.

doc-id.title: Document Identifier
doc-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

type.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: A value with a name, attributed to the containing control, part, or group.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

annotation.title: Annotation
annotation.description: A name/value pair with optional explanatory remarks.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

value.title: Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the characteristic.

location.title: Location
location.description: A location, with associated metadata that can be referenced.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

location-uuid.title: Location Reference
location-uuid.description: References a location defined in metadata.

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity, either singular (an organization or person) or collective (multiple persons)

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

type.title: Party Type
type.description: A category describing the kind of party the object describes.

party-uuid.title: Party Reference
party-uuid.description: References a party defined in metadata.

external-id.title: Personal Identifier
external-id.description: An identifier for a person (such as an ORCID) using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

member-of-organization.title: Organizational Affiliation
member-of-organization.description: Identifies that the containing object is a member of the organization associated with the provided UUID.

rlink.title: Resource link
rlink.description: A pointer to an external copy of a document with optional hash for verification

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

party-name.title: Party Name
party-name.description: The full (legal) name of the party.

short-name.title: short-name
short-name.description: A common name, short name or acronym

addr-line.title: Address line
addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for mailing address

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL for web site or Internet presence

text.title: Text
text.description: A line of textual content whose semantic is determined by the context of use.

biblio.title: Bibliographic Definition
biblio.description: A container in which a set of bibliographic information can included. The model of this information is undefined by OSCAL.

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A resource associated with the present document, which may be a pointer to other data or a citation.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A citation consisting of end note text and optional structured bibliographic data.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

role.title: Role
role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

responsible-party.title: Responsible Party
responsible-party.description: A reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role relative to the parent context.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for display and navigation

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

description.title: Description
description.description: A description supporting the parent item.

remarks.title: Remarks
remarks.description: Additional commentary on the parent item.

responsible-role.title: Responsible Role
responsible-role.description: A reference to one or more roles with responsibility for performing a function relative to the control.

set-parameter.title: Set Parameter Value
set-parameter.description: Identifies the parameter that will be filled in by the enclosed value element.

value.title: Value
value.description: The phrase or string that fills-in the parameter and completes the requirement statement.

system-security-plan.title: System Security Plan (SSP)
system-security-plan.description: A system security plan, such as those described in NIST SP 800-18

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

import-profile.title: Import Profile
import-profile.description: Used to import the OSCAL profile representing the system's control baseline.

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

system-characteristics.title: System Characteristics
system-characteristics.description: Contains the characteristics of the system, such as its name, purpose, and security impact level.

system-id.title: System Identification
system-id.description: A unique identifier for the system described by this system security plan.

identifier-type.title: Identification System Type
identifier-type.description: Identifies the identification system from which the provided identifier was assigned.

system-name.title: System Name (Full)
system-name.description: The full name of the system.

system-name-short.title: System Name (Short)
system-name-short.description: A short name for the system, such as an acronym, that is suitable for display in a data table or summary list.

security-sensitivity-level.title: Security Sensitivity Level
security-sensitivity-level.description: The overall information system sensitivity categorization, such as defined by FIPS-199.

system-information.title: System Information
system-information.description: Contains details about all information types that are stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and those defined in NIST SP 800-60.

information-type.title: Information Type
information-type.description: Contains details about one information type that is stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and those defined in NIST SP 800-60.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

information-type-id.title: Information Type Identifier
information-type-id.description: An identifier qualified by the given identification system used, such as NIST SP 800-60.

confidentiality-impact.title: Confidentiality Impact Level
confidentiality-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized disclosure of information.

integrity-impact.title: Integrity Impact Level
integrity-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized modification of information.

availability-impact.title: Availability Impact Level
availability-impact.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the disruption of access to or use of information or the information system.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justification for the change.

security-impact-level.title: Security Impact Level
security-impact-level.description: The overall level of expected impact resulting from unauthorized disclosure, modification, or loss of access to information.

security-objective-confidentiality.title: Security Objective: Confidentiality
security-objective-confidentiality.description: A target-level of confidentiality for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

security-objective-integrity.title: Security Objective: Integrity
security-objective-integrity.description: A target-level of integrity for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

security-objective-availability.title: Security Objective: Availability
security-objective-availability.description: A target-level of availability for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

status.title: Status
status.description: Describes the operational status of the system.

leveraged-authorization.title: Leveraged Authorization
leveraged-authorization.description: A description of another authorized system from which this system inherits capabilities that satisfy security requirements. Another term for this concept is a common control provider.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

date-authorized.title: System Authorization Date
date-authorized.description: The date this system received its authorization.

authorization-boundary.title: Authorization Boundary
authorization-boundary.description: A description of this system's authorization boundary, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate the authorization boundary.

diagram.title: Diagram
diagram.description: A graphic that provides a visual representation the system, or some aspect of it.

caption.title: Caption
caption.description: A brief caption to annotate the diagram.

network-architecture.title: Network Architecture
network-architecture.description: A description of the system's network architecture, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate the network architecture.

data-flow.title: Data Flow
data-flow.description: A description of the logical flow of information within the system and across its boundaries, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate these flows.

system-implementation.title: System Implementation
system-implementation.description: Provides information as to how the system is implemented.

user.title: System User Class
user.description: A type of user that interacts with the system based on an associated role.

role-id.title: Role Identifier Reference
role-id.description: A reference to the roles served by the user.

authorized-privilege.title: Privilege
authorized-privilege.description: Identifies a specific system privilege held by the user, along with an associated description and/or rationale for the privilege.

function-performed.title: Functions Performed
function-performed.description: Describes a function performed for a given authorized privilege by this user class.

component.title: Component
component.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

component-type.title: Component Type
component-type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Information about the protocol used to provide a service.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

name.description: The short name of the protocol (e.g., TLS).

port-range.title: Port Range
port-range.description: Where applicable this is the IPv4 port range on which the service operates.

start.title: Start
start.description: Indicates the starting port number in a port range

end.title: End
end.description: Indicates the ending port number in a port range

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Describes the purpose for the service within the system.

system-inventory.title: System Inventory
system-inventory.description: A set of inventory-item entries that represent the managed inventory instances of the system.

inventory-item.title: Inventory Item
inventory-item.description: A single managed inventory item within the system.

asset-id.title: Asset Identifier
asset-id.description: Organizational asset identifier that is unique in the context of the system. This may be a reference to the identifier used in an asset tracking system or a vulnerability scanning tool.

implemented-component.title: Implemented Component
implemented-component.description: The set of componenets that are implemented in a given system inventory item.

control-implementation.title: Control Implementation
control-implementation.description: Describes how the system satisfies a set of controls.

implemented-requirement.title: Control-based Requirement
implemented-requirement.description: Describes how the system satisfies an individual control.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

statement.title: Specific Statement
statement.description: Identifies which statements within a control are addressed.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

by-component.title: Component Control Implementation
by-component.description: Defines how the referenced component implements a set of controls.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

export.title: Export
export.description: Identifies content intended for external consumption, such as with leveraged organizations.

provided.title: Provided
provided.description: Describes a capability which may be inherited by a leveraging system.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Describes a responsibiity imposed on a leveraging system.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

provided-uuid.title: Provided UUID
provided-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.

inherited.title: Inherited
inherited.description: Describes a responsibiity imposed on a leveraging system.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

provided-uuid.title: Provided UUID
provided-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.

satisfied.title: Satisfied
satisfied.description: Describes how this system satisfies a responsibiity imposed by a leveraged system.

uuid.title: Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A RFC 4122 version 4 Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the containing object.

responsibility-uuid.title: Provided UUID
responsibility-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.
